title: How to have an account on the test server? (PBE)
body: Hello, I'm from Brazil, but I am here to ask you how I carry myself to get an account on PBE, what procedures should I follow for at least I compete to be a tester? Thank you all! (Sorry my bad english ahaha)

replies.body: For NA accounts, players can [sign up for the PBE](https://pbesignup.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/pbe).  Some factors include having an account in good standing, but I don't have further information beyond what is in our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ).  Keep in mind that signing up for PBE may be different for other regions, but I hope that helps!
